docs.text: Error creating bean with name 'authenticationManager': Cannot resolve reference to bean 'activeDirectory' while setting bean property 'providers' Stopped the Jenkins service, and unregistered and registered the service using the following in an administrative command prompt: cd \ Program Files ( x86 )\ Jenkins net stop jenkins jenkins uninstall jenkins install net start jenkins
docs.title: Error authenticationmanager

docs.text: Stopped the Jenkins service, and unregistered and registered the service using the following in an administrative command prompt: cd \ Program Files ( x86 )\ Jenkins net stop jenkins jenkins uninstall jenkins install net start jenkins
docs.title: Error creating bean with name 'authenticationManager': Cannot resolve reference to bean 'activeDirectory' while setting bean property 'providers'

docs.text: bypass certificate validiation Error when using these cmdlets or these messages appear: TLS/SSL secure channel error Import-Module Invoke-"Commands" The request was aborted: Could not create SSL/TLS secure channel. Solution if ( -not ( [System.Management.Automation.PSTypeName] 'ServerCertificateValidationCallback' ). Type ) { $certCallback = @" using System; using System.Net; using System.Net.Security; using System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates; public class ServerCertificateValidationCallback { public static void Ignore() { if(ServicePointManager.ServerCertificateValidationCallback ==null) { ServicePointManager.ServerCertificateValidationCallback += delegate ( Object obj, X509Certificate certificate, X509Chain chain, SslPolicyErrors errors ) { return true; }; } } } "@ Add-Type $certCallback } [ServerCertificateValidationCallback] :: Ignore ()
docs.title: Bypass certifcate validation

docs.text: TLS/SSL secure channel error Import-Module Invoke-"Commands" The request was aborted: Could not create SSL/TLS secure channel.
docs.title: Error when using these cmdlets or these messages appear:

docs.text: if ( -not ( [System.Management.Automation.PSTypeName] 'ServerCertificateValidationCallback' ). Type ) { $certCallback = @" using System; using System.Net; using System.Net.Security; using System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates; public class ServerCertificateValidationCallback { public static void Ignore() { if(ServicePointManager.ServerCertificateValidationCallback ==null) { ServicePointManager.ServerCertificateValidationCallback += delegate ( Object obj, X509Certificate certificate, X509Chain chain, SslPolicyErrors errors ) { return true; }; } } } "@ Add-Type $certCallback } [ServerCertificateValidationCallback] :: Ignore ()
docs.title: Solution

Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs help - Print this help message. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
